body.name: Cyber Acoustics USB & Bluetooth Speaker Bar (CA-2890PRO) USB Powered Speaker with Speakerphone for PC and Bluetooth for Smartphones, Clamps to Monitors up to 2 Inches Thick
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 mins
features: USB Powered Speaker with Bluetooth – Connection to PC, Mac or Chromebook with a single USB-C cable or USB-A with included adapter and simultaneously connect to your smartphone with Bluetooth 5.3. No need to take up valuable workspace, the CA-2890PRO is an improved design that is larger, offering louder high-quality sound and a new clamp design to fit larger monitors up to 2” thick.

Higher Quality Crystal Clear Sound for Music and Calls – The CA-2890PRO is a great way to give your ears a break from headsets for music, movies, voice and video calls. This small speaker is an audio upgrade that produces surprisingly loud sound. Designed and engineered for greater sound clarity, accurate mids and clear highs from dual precision acoustic stereo drivers and a rear facing bass radiator enhance the sound quality making it great for music and movies in addition to calls.

Multi-Purpose Use – The CA-2890PRO offers simultaneous connection to PC or Mac via USB and to smartphones via Bluetooth, making it flexible for music, movies, calls on your Smartphone or for video calls on Zoom, Teams, or any other video conferencing platform. Featuring multiple microphones and Echo Cancelation for excellent voice pickup, it also includes Smart Voice Enhancement Technology to minimize background noise, so you are heard more clearly by those you are speaking with.

Easy to Use – Ideal for small desks or minimalist setups the CA-2890PRO is plug-and-play, no installation needed. The speaker conveniently attaches to the bottom of most monitors (2” thick or less) with easily accessible controls that include a multi-function button for simple switching between USB and Bluetooth, play/pause, volume up and down, and mic mute with LED indicator. USB-C to USB-A converter included to connect to laptops with limited or no USB-C ports.

Includes – Cyber Acoustics CA-2890PRO USB and Bluetooth Speaker Bar, USB-C to USB-A Adapter and User Guide. Includes 1 year warranty. Our US based customer service team is here to help. Contact us through Amazon.

productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,629 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: No more headset hair or ear fatigue Enjoy surprisingly loud, clear audio from a compact form factor. Great for voice or video calls, as well as music and movies.

Larger Clamp Larger clamp design accommodates most contemporary monitors and laptops. New larger cabinet delivers greater sound clarity and optimized power output. USB Connection Connection to your PC, Mac or Chromebook with a single USB cable. USB-A to USB-C adapter included. Space-Saving Speaker Affix it to the side of your monitor or laptop, or stand it upright on your desktop — choose what suits you best. Bluetooth Connection Simultaneously connect to your smartphone with Bluetooth & easily switch between connected devices with a conveniently located multi-function button.

Cyber Acoustics Space Saving Speakers CA-2890PRO Add to Cart CA-2890 Add to Cart CA-2890BT Add to Cart SP-2000 Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,629 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,629 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,629 4.2 out of 5 stars 154 Price $39.99$39.99 $24.99$24.99 $29.99$29.99 $49.99$49.99 Connection USB-A, USB-C, Bluetooth USB-A USB-A, USB-C, Bluetooth USB-A, USB-C, Bluetooth Speakerphone ✔ ✘ ✔ ✔ Cable Length 6 Feet 6 Feet 6 Feet 6 Feet Battery N/A N/A N/A Up to 12 Hours Compatibility Windows, Mac, Phones Windows, Mac Windows, Mac, Phones Windows, Mac, Phones

What is the difference between the CA-2890BT and CA-2890PRO The CA-2890PRO has larger cabinet, a larger clip, and more power for louder, richer sound. Why does my microphone sound so strange? Make sure that the CA-2890PRO is set as both your computer's input and output. Check your system settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but sounds OK
reviews.reviewText: It is basically plug and play. It is small and clamps on to my monitor. You would not even notice that I have a speaker attached to my system. It is powered by the USB connection, so there is no concern about an electrical outlet. I just use the volume control icon on my laptop and it works fine. Very pleased with the product. Perfect for speaking communications with another party with the computer access.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little speaker!
reviews.reviewText: Got this to use with my Home office setup. Speaker securely and easily clips to the bottom of my monitor and can be connected via USB or Bluetooth. I have mine connected to my work laptop via USB-C, to take advantage of the extra sound power offered when connected over usb-c. Tested them with some YT videos and some songs and was blown away with the sound quality! Though this isn't the most bass heavy speaker unit, it does provide enough bass to make everything sound good! I mainly use them when watching videos so I'm not too worried about it not having desk shaking bass. Theae speakers don't sound like a tincan and they get quite loud. So far, this speaker has fit my needs perfectly and done so quite well. Doesn't feel or sound cheap and works exactly as described. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s good, just sounds like a small speaker
reviews.reviewText: The set up was easy and it came in very good condition. The audio control works good, even with a headset. The only thing is it sounds like a hand held speaker at times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally agree with all the positive reviews
reviews.reviewText: This is a little USB speaker that is both powered and driven by USB. It appears as a USB audio output device on Mac, Windows and Linux. A single cable is all that is needed, which is essential for a clean look when mounted to the bottom of a monitor.The speaker is relatively small and light, which are essential when mounting to a monitor, particularly when the monitor is on an articulating arm. We don't want to add excessive weight on such a setup.Despite its diminutive size and weight, the speaker performs superbly well. The sound is rich, balanced and powerful compared to other products in its class that I have tried...and shelved because of their lackluster performance. This speaker is a little gem that belies its outward appearance.If you want to save desk space, have a clean look with a single cable, and don't want to compromise audio performance then give this thing a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Speaker
reviews.reviewText: This Cyber Acoustics speaker is great. The plug and play feature makes it very easy to use. It has a clip so it can be attached to the bottom or top of the monitor. For a cluttered desk this is a real space saver.The sound quality is great for use on a PC. The controls are simple. It's always on when the PC is on. It has four buttons: volume +, volume -, mute and a pause button that pause whatever is playing. It's a great little speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stereo? I am only getting the left channel
reviews.reviewText: I have not tried the Bluetooth usage. I thought this was Stereo (It said it was on the listing), but found that I do not get a right channel out of it. Tested on multiple systems.I bought this for better sound on my monitor that I have connected to my bedstand. Sound is better than the monitor sound, deeper and fuller sound profile... but only on the left channel. No right sound at all.I have tested this on windows 10 and 11 on three different machines, just to see if it was a machine issue.I am not sure if this is a recent thing, or if it came this way, as most of the stuff I listen to with it does not really have a stereo need so did not notice it until I had something that used both channels independently. Surprise, could not hear right side.Pros:- Mono sound is good, deep and fuller sound than most default monitor sounds- Good volumeCons:- Only plays left side sound- Monitor grip is a little long for the top of the two monitors I have tried it on, so I have to lift it off a bit to stop it from occluding the screen, which makes it fall off every now and again and swing from the back of the monitor (I have it anchored at the back)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great speaker - Sound is Loud and Clear
reviews.reviewText: I bought this speaker to augment sound on my work desktop. I stream for work and this speaker takes every audio and makes it louder.The speaker works great. It’s perfect for my needs. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price, QOL some issues though.
reviews.reviewText: For my Switch, I use a monitor that doesn't have a speaker, and so I bought this just for my Switch. I connect via USB, but got the BT version of this speaker since it was only 5 bucks more to have the expanded utility should I ever want it.It's easy to set up, stays put when clamped to the monitor, and the sound quality is quite good for a 30 dollar USB/Bluetooth speaker. However, I have two major gripes:1. The LED lights are large (compared to what I see on similar electronics), bright, and can't be turned off without disconnecting the speaker. I use a product called light dims blackout edition (you can buy them on Amazon for cheap, they're very useful beyond this product!) to block this LED so it's not an actual issue for me, but it's notable as an issue that you can't dim or disable the LED.2. There is a voice alert that says, I believe, "PC connected." when it senses it has received a connection. I have never paired anything to it with Bluetooth, only USB. I can *maybe* understand this voice alert for wireless connection, but it's pointless with a wired connection, I know when it's connected, I plugged it in! This is an issue because, for some reason, this will occasionally sound "PC connected" when my Switch is in sleep mode. I suspect perhaps this has something to do with the Switch semi-waking to check for system/software updates or something, but it was quite the surprise when it sounded out in the middle of the night! I checked the (ahaha right as I'm typing this, with my Switch sleeping, it said it!) paperwork that came with the speaker and can find no way to turn this alert off. It happens a few times a day. This will likely cause me to return it, since I don't want it randomly making noise in my bedroom.
Just what I needed to watch movies etc. from my laptop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For £25 I think this is a great deal. Size is smaller than I expected and it’s a bit light and “plasticky” but sound is very good for the price. It’s light. Attaches easily to my 27” monitor. Dead easy to set up. Other reviewers comments on tinny sound/lack of bass. It’s really not that noticeable to me. I started with a song with a deep bass line on Spotify and adjusted controls as needed. I’ll mostly be using this for conference calls and webinars so music isn’t that important (I use my ear buds).Overall very pleased.Will report back if anything changes. Hopefully will last.

Good & Clear sound. Loud enough for personal use.Has been looking for a similar speaker (which can be clamped to laptop) since the Philips one went off market. Only a single cable is a big plus.However, considering that it costs almost thrice as the Philips one, let's see how long it lasts.It is simple plug and play, both on Windows and Linux.However the volume in digital mode is noticeably low than analogue mode.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best usb desktop speaker at this price range
reviews.reviewText: At this price range, it has best bass and high quality usb powered desktop speaker. It can also be connected to smartphones with its usb c adapter. Only downside in this speaker is missing 3.5 mm jack port. They should have included in it to make it, more useful and convenient.
